snippet.title: Need to Know - The Mass Surveillance Thriller Game - Kickstarter trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/490930/Need_to_Know/?platform=ytK 
Wishlist on GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/need_to_know 
Pre-order & site: http://www.monomyth-games.com

Wow! Need to Know was over 460% funded on Kickstarter! Visit our successful campaign here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/monomythgames/need-to-know-the-mass-surveillance-thriller-game
Thanks so much to our backers!

VISIT US ON STEAM GREENLIGHT:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=624889801

THE WORLD IS BEING WATCHED. BY YOU.
The game that puts you on the other side of the surveillance looking glass.
Will you stand up for privacy, or help create an unstoppable police state?

To stay updated:
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MonomythGames
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/MonomythGames
Visit the game's website: http://www.needtoknowgame.com
Visit our website:  http://www.monomyth-games.com

Music: 
'Calabash'
Written and Performed by 'Co.fee'
Licence: CC BY 3.0
http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Cofee/Bonus_Beat_Blast_2011/13_co_fee-calabash

Narration:
'Opening Statement to USHOR Subcommittee on Technology,'
Delivered by Dan Geer on 11 February 1997
http://www.americanrhetoric.com/speeches/dangeercongress1997.htm
